WRITING.TITLE: Does it take this long to get your schedule?
WRITING.TEXT: Hey everyone, so I was hired as a seasonal employee and I had orientation last week. We were told we #8217;d get a call about our schedules on Monday. I decided to call and they told me our schedules weren #8217;t ready and that if I didn #8217;t receive a call the next day to call again. So I called again after waiting and the person who answered took my name and number and said I #8217;d get a call. It #8217;s still early so I #8217;m going to wait again today but I don #8217;t want to call 3 days in a row. Does it usually take this long especially now with new hires? This is my first job so I don #8217;t want to screw up :/
I checked online and they have me scheduled for Sunday but Im still not sure if I should call again, I still haven #8217;t been called :/ I #8217;ll wait until tomorrow though, thank you!

We were told about Kronos but they did warn us that it isn #8217;t great so I checked online and I #8217;m scheduled for Sunday, I #8217;m still gonna wait and see if they #8217;ll call though, thank you!

I #8217;m scheduled for tomorrow and they never called me back, I guess I #8217;ll just go in and see what happens. My sisters brother in law also works at another target and said that everything is completely unorganized and no one noticed that he just didn #8217;t show up for work one day so I guess they #8217;re just that busy. Hopefully it goes well for you

WRITING.TITLE: Tips for fulfillment?
WRITING.TEXT: Hey y #8217;all, I started as a seasonal fulfillment employee on Sunday. Doing pick up orders was pretty easy but doing orders that are being shipped out was a bit of a struggle. The guy who trained me was super nice but he talked a bit fast at times and there were some things I forgot to ask him so now I was wondering if anyone here could help me out 1. My back was absolutely KILLING me as well as my head, if anyone else felt this do you get used to it?? I took an Advil after my shift was over 2. When I first get there do I go to the room where we leave pick ups to get a cart? That #8217;s kind of what I saw my trainer do but another member came in looking for a cart and couldn #8217;t find the kind with 2 baskets and it looked like she used a regular one, so can we do that? 3. Do I have to announce over the walkie when I #8217;m going on break/lunch? Any other tips are welcomed, I #8217;m a bit nervous as I work tomorrow again :/ I #8217;m hoping I can catch on soon

Honestly I have super bad anxiety so I #8217;m having a hard time knowing I #8217;ll have to communicate with people and that #8217;s what I #8217;m mostly afraid of, I got along well with the guy who trained me and he won #8217;t be there tomorrow so it freaks me out having to ask other people for help ;-; but thank you for the advice, I #8217;ll do my best to get over it and ask questions

I just replied to someone that I #8217;m mostly afraid of communication because I have really bad anxiety but I really don #8217;t want to screw this up and I know I need to know my coworkers in case I need help so I #8217;ll just try to get over it, thank you for the advice I #8217;ll try to do my best tomorrow!

Thank you this was super helpful, for some reason it freaks me out using the walkie so I #8217;d rather just talk face to face with another member about taking my break. On my first day I didn #8217;t take my break until 15 minutes before my shift was over and I didn #8217;t even announce it, my trainer just sent me on my way and after the break I went home so it didn #8217;t hit me until after that I #8217;m probably supposed to let them know. But thank you your comment was very helpful!

Yeah I think I #8217;ll just take my break when it #8217;s not busy, I didn #8217;t get too tired and I waited until my last 15 minutes to take a break and I didn #8217;t say anything because my trainer just told me to go. I didn #8217;t even think about the water lol I #8217;ll definitely try to have my bottle with me, thank you
Nike Air Force, they didn #8217;t really hurt my feet it #8217;s just my back that started to hurt really bad after about 2 hours
Lol I understand that, I #8217;ll try it out and I #8217;ll keep my water on me
Oof yeah my trainer warned me that Black Friday gets crazy so I #8217;m trying to catch on quickly so I don #8217;t have a mental breakdown during the madness :/

WRITING.TITLE: Schedule messed up
WRITING.TEXT: So I just checked my schedule to double check what time I go in tomorrow and they changed my Sunday from 10 am-6 pm to 1 am-6 pm. 17 hours. Has this happened to anyone? Obviously it has to be a mistake because there #8217;s no way that #8217;s legal? I #8217;m gonna say something tomorrow because I definitely will not be doing that lol I #8217;m only seasonal and only supposed to be doing part time hours

Yeah I really panicked when I saw it lol I still don #8217;t understand why they changed it though, next week I #8217;m only working 3 days all 10-6 so I guess it must #8217;ve been a mistake #175;\_( #12484;)_/ #175; I #8217;ll definitely be talking to someone about it

WRITING.TITLE: Fearing for my life on thanksgiving
WRITING.TEXT: This is my first thanksgiving working and I #8217;m scared as hell ;-; for the target veterans, is thanksgiving worse than Black Friday? Or is it the other way around? I #8217;m scheduled 10am -6pm (fulfillment) so the store will be closed most of my shift but that last hour is making me fear for my life lol there #8217;s also the possibility that they #8217;ll ask me to stay later. For those who do fulfillment on thanksgiving, do they still make us do OPU even though the store is closed or will we do SFS? And since the store is closed how do we get in? I feel like this is a dumb question but I forgot to ask someone lol will they open the door for employees?

WRITING.TITLE: All of us walking out of work today and tomorrow. I got out at 6 after doing SFS and OPU from 10 am. Good luck soldiers.

WRITING.TEXT: Oh Jesus I won #8217;t complain again ;-; lol you #8217;re a hero I can barely do 8 hour shifts without crying
Ooof we were a bit behind when I got there but I think we completed our orders on time, I left when opu was slowing down

At my store it seemed to calm down at about 5:30, in that first half hour electronics and toys were absolutely SWAMPED but by the time I was leaving it was pretty calm, still a good amount of people walking around but not as packed so maybe it won #8217;t be too bad tomorrow
I was ready to leave after an hour lol I got home and just laid on the floor, couldn #8217;t even make it to the couch #128556;
Oh god good luck soldier you got this, hopefully it #8217;s not too chaotic tomorrow ;-;

WRITING.TITLE: Got called in to work today
WRITING.TEXT: And I said no. Will this make me look bad? :/ I #8217;m still super tired from all the orders yesterday and I just wanted to stay in and do nothing. They said it was fine and I #8217;m sure they have more people to call but I feel pretty guilty about it. I #8217;m seasonal but I already have a feeling they aren #8217;t going to keep me cause I #8217;m pretty slow at picking orders. I #8217;ve stayed over time before but this is the first time they #8217;ve asked me to come in and I was just too tired but my sister is on my ass for not going in

She kept telling me they won #8217;t do any favors for me since I couldn #8217;t do this for them but I stayed 3 hours over my schedule last week cause they were really behind and then when I asked my team leader if I could come in a little late next week she rudely said no :/ I do feel bad for my other fulfillment coworkers cause now they #8217;ll have a lot to do
That #8217;s what I was thinking but I still felt pretty bad for my coworkers cause they #8217;re probably swamped rn :/ thank you though
I #8217;m scheduled for 33 hours next week and the week after that 14 hrs, just 3 days lmao I mean ok I guess :/

I only worked 8 hours yesterday but I said no today because I was super tired and once Saturday comes I don #8217;t have a day off again until Wednesday :/ I #8217;m hoping they won #8217;t be upset about it

WRITING.TITLE: On the verge of promoting myself to guest after 3 weeks here :)
WRITING.TEXT: I started in fulfillment a little more than 3 weeks ago and from the very beginning I could tell my team leader didn #8217;t like me. She would talk to me like I #8217;m stupid and if I ever let her know about something I couldn #8217;t find she #8217;d basically interrogate me to see if I REALLY tried to find it until she #8217;d decide to INF it. Well today I finally noticed that when any of my other coworkers (also seasonal) ask her about an item she #8217;ll talk to them all sweet and just INF it without interrogating them. She #8217;s overall friendly with literally every single person in the store EXCEPT me. I #8217;ve never been rude to this woman so idk why she acts like that towards me. Lately all my shifts have been SFS. I hate doing SFS and I #8217;m much faster in OPU while one SFS batch takes me at least an hour. Today my STL very loudly said #8220;your pick rate is way too low just go stock instead #8221; as I was finishing a batch. There were a handful of team members around who heard and started laughing and one of them even told him to calm down. I stocked for the last 4 hours of my shift and every time my fulfillment coworkers saw me they #8217;d look at me like they felt bad for me. I honestly just want to quit already cause I almost cried when he yelled at me and I was never shown how to stock or anything. I don #8217;t even want to put in my 2 weeks, I just want to stop showing up. I applied here because I desperately need money for Christmas presents but this is seriously not worth it.

I feel like it #8217;s not a big deal but it made me feel pretty cry and I had to hold back tears and just cried when I got home. I don #8217;t think it #8217;s worth telling HR like you suggested cause I doubt they #8217;d do anything but I #8217;ll definitely be quitting probably next week

Oh yeah I do get that it #8217;s just that it seems like she only does it to me, when I show her an item I couldn #8217;t find she #8217;ll look at the last delivery and the on hand number and everything but today I saw a few seasonals who started at the same time as me ask her about items and she just tells them to INF them

Thank you so much :( there #8217;s still just a lot of things I don #8217;t understand like with on hand, on floor and stuff and the whole reason he screamed at me was because my team leader had me look for a beanie she was absolutely sure she saw a #8220;ton #8221; of on the floor but there were absolutely none left and he got upset with me for wasting time and not INFing it. I really just don #8217;t want to work with these people anymore and my depression and anxiety has gotten 10000x worse since I started there so I think I #8217;m just gonna quit next week

Thank you guys :( I really wanted to get presents for my nieces and nephews because I couldn #8217;t get them anything last year. I want to just stop showing up because having to work 2 more weeks with those people gives me anxiety but this is the only job I #8217;ve ever had (I #8217;m 19) and I don #8217;t want to look bad in other interviews if they find out that I stopped showing up to the only job I #8217;ve ever had

WRITING.TITLE: Promoted to guest after next week
WRITING.TEXT: I #8217;m seasonal and was truly hoping that I #8217;d be let go after the holidays because I really could not keep doing this. I honestly don #8217;t know how y #8217;all do it (esp fulfillment). Well today I checked the New Years schedule and I #8217;m not on for that week so I #8217;m assuming that next week is my last. I don #8217;t even mean to sound ungrateful for this job but feel like a HUGE weight has been lifted off my shoulders. Anyways....assuming that Monday is my last day (that #8217;s the only day I #8217;m scheduled next week lmao) will they let me know or is that it?? I #8217;m assuming they #8217;d want my employee discount card back but I #8217;m too nervous to ask them about it lol and do I have to wait until next payday to get my final check?? Well good luck regular team members. It was quite an anxiety fueled adventure working here :)
Damn that #8217;s tough lmao I wish they #8217;d tell me instead but I #8217;m gonna go ahead and assume it #8217;s my last day and enjoy my week #128526;

WRITING.TITLE: Reduction in only one breast??
WRITING.TEXT: So I #8217;m a 32 or 34B cup in one breast and I wanna say some C cup in the other. When I wear a B bra it fits my smaller boob and the other one will not stay in. I always wear some sort of bra 24/7 (sports bra, bralette, etc) even around my house because my right breast is so obviously bigger than the other one and people have pointed it out before even if I #8217;m wearing a baggy shirt, but sometimes regular bras don #8217;t help hide it. I want to have surgery to make the bigger breast small like the other one but I #8217;m not sure if that #8217;s even a thing since it #8217;s not a DRAMATIC difference but it #8217;s enough for other people to notice and it bothers me as well. Has anyone ever had something like this done? I #8217;m not sure if this is a dumb question but would the cost be lower since I only want one breast done?? I feel kind of selfish considering doing it since it #8217;s not a dramatic difference like what I #8217;ve seen on this sub :/ I #8217;m very skinny so I feel like going smaller would look best on me, I can #8217;t handle the big breast i already have Any advice is welcomed
I actually haven #8217;t looked into it, would that be easier or something?? It #8217;s not a huge difference so I #8217;m not sure if getting it fixed would require like a big surgery

I looked through the top posts on here and I saw one girl that had hers fixed but hers was way worse than mine (not to be rude lol) and I know surgery can be done to fix unevenness but I feel like mine are not TOO uneven but it #8217;s enough to bother me :/ I just wasn #8217;t sure if it #8217;d be worth it to fix it or if a surgeon would even think it needs to be fixed
Thank you!! I #8217;ll definitely look into it and hopefully I can get it done in the next few months
Yeah I think I #8217;m going to book a consultation probably next month and hopefully I can get it done in the next few months!! Thank you :)

I don #8217;t time travel often but I #8217;ve been doing it now because I #8217;m moving my villagers houses around. Merengue just asked to move out and I said yes and my niece will be visiting my island to take her but I want to travel to tomorrow when she #8217;ll be in boxes. If I do it and my niece talks her into moving in and I travel to the next day (when merengue is gone) will it affect her game at all? She won #8217;t be doing any traveling, only I will but will merengue still go to her island if I travel 2 days ahead?? Pls don #8217;t drag me if this is a dumb question #128128;
Omg thank you I was worried, I think I #8217;m gonna wait until she #8217;s in boxes and then I #8217;ll travel after they talk #129402;
Thank you!!
I was concerned :( I #8217;m not going to do it though I #8217;ll just wait
Lana Del Rey-Norman Fucking Rockwell. I #8217;m disappointed I didn #8217;t see anyone say it :/ I thought she couldn #8217;t top ultraviolence but she managed to do it for me
